title: We just gonna ignore AP Shyvana not only existing but being WILDLY overpowered?
body:
As the title states we just gonna pretend it's okay she's now building AP and being played as an assassin? Like we're okay with this (and cheating pieces of shit like this)?

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=tehmkanch

replies.body:
You should send that to RossBoomsocks lol

New BoosterBusters episode, that person is getting hard boosted XD
your argument that she's op is that some obvious smurf is smashing low elo players with her?

AP shyvana is decent.

But she is not an assasin, she is a poke champion. If you can play her as an assassin you are too low elo still.

AP is the only way I play her and I think she works best as an assassin.  She can kill any squishy with R, E, gunblade, blue smite, auto, and Q in less than a second.  The continued AoE damage from her W will then do a generous amount of damage to anyone else in the area before you either run away to farm your ult back up or die.

It doesn't really work that way in high elo. Because you can't risk getting flashed/dodged on the RE and give away 1000g for free and no reason. And you are a sitting duck. In sub plat elo's where everyone is stoned/bad it does work great though.

Best way to play her in high elo is to pop R before a tower siege/defence or an objective/teamfight is about to happen and use 4-5 fireballs on the enemies until they can no longer contest shit. Her R is too slow to hit reliably when her enemies have mechanics and reaction times better than an intoxicated sloth.

AP Shyvana has been a thing for the past...6 seasons. Nobody cares because it's insanely weak unless the team playing against her is feeding her to the point where she seems strong because she has more items.
This isn't because AP Shyvana.  This is because an obviously stolen/bought/borrowed account.  Nobody goes from about a 2 KDA average to an 8 KDA in a single season.

AP amumu is the hidden OP ap champion.

With his 2 stuns you cant flash or escape the combo and his W can reach 15% max health a seconds which can melt dragon and baron.
